step.cmd: Select the column whose data you want to split into separate columns.
In the HomeFormatSplit On menu item, click Tab to split the data on tab characters, Space to split the data on spaces, or type the splitting character in the box.
step.info: You can specify more than one splitting character. For example, if you select Tab and Space and you type ";" in the box, Ormetis Professional edition splits the data into a new column at every tab, space or ";" character.
